milestones: Built & deployed a microservice utilizing customer data to send personalized product recommendations via automated printable flyers, saving marketing workload for the business team.

Co-authored a high-performance supplier price list document parsing and normalization system that translates inconsistent formats, slangs, and abbreviations into structured data using vectorized operations.
Designed and implemented an admin operations page with a custom filtering interface, enabling real-time insights into daily customer purchase patterns.
